description:
When people in Miami, Florida, need aggressive counsel for a class-action lawsuit, they turn to Aronovitz Law. Since 1988, our law office has relied on three generations of experience to advocate for clients and represent them in litigation. We handle several types of matters:

• Medical malpractice
• Whistleblower/qui tam
• Consumer law

We also take on personal injury and wrongful death cases. Our attorneys are able to assist victims of motor vehicle crashes, slips and falls, cruise ship accidents and construction accidents. Our law office works relentlessly to seek compensation for all pain and suffering, including lost wages and hindered earning potential. In one past case, we secured a $20 million settlement for the victim of an anesthesia error.

Our attorneys have earned the recognition of Best Lawyers, Super Lawyers and Florida Legal Elite. U.S. News & World Report, The Wall Street Journal, Miami Magazine and South Florida Legal Guide have acknowledged our team as leading trial attorneys. The National Association of Distinguished Counsel has also chosen attorney Tod Aronovitz to be a member of the prestigious Nation’s Top One Percent.

Our law office is able to represent a diverse clientele with services in Spanish. Aronovitz Law serves clients throughout Florida.
